name: Himekari
description:
Himekari is an adventure-themed mobile game with rhythmic beat ‘em up mechanics. The mechanics of the game is a hybrid mix of rhythm and beat ‘em up meaning players are tasked to use their cognitive skills to finish beat maps as they beat enemies called the Refrains. The game shares a story of a group called the Guardians of Light and a mercenary named Rune, who gets pulled into their quest of capturing the thieves and stop the awakening of Tree Song. Join them as Rune starts to realize that these girls are more than what they seem to be. A harmonious adventure to protect the World Score.
